doc.title: useUserCollections
doc.body:
This hook is [SWR powered](https://docs.reservoir.tools/docs/hooks#swr-powered-hooks). Use this hook to fetch a single user's collections using the [Users Collections](ref:getusersusercollectionsv2) endpoint. It takes an address, as the first parameter, an optional query object which maps to the same parameters that the API endpoint uses, as the second parameter, and an optional [SWR Infinite](https://swr.vercel.app/docs/pagination#useswrinfinite) configuration object, as the third parameter.

```typescript
import { useUserCollections } from '@reservoir0x/reservoir-kit-ui'

const { data: collections } = useUserCollections("0xFd03726FD90ccc7386bf62b44Bb594f7cbFB3995")
```
